sql-case.value: GRANT SELECT (order_id) ON ds_0.t_order TO user1
GRANT INSERT, SELECT, UPDATE, DELETE ON *.* TO user1
GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON *.* TO user1
GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON ds_0.* TO user1
GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON ds_0.t_order TO user1
GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON FUNCTION ds_0.function1 TO user1
GRANT PROXY ON user1 TO user2
GRANT PROXY ON user1 TO user2, user3
GRANT role1, role2 TO user1, user2
